name: 1Flow
long_description:
[1Flow](https://1flow.ai) is building a user engagement layer for all apps on mobile and web to help companies increase conversion and reduce churn at scale – starting with in-product user feedback collection. Our first product is a flexible tech platform to collect in-product user feedback, that directly feeds into product development so you can know why churn and conversion happen, and launch features that will have a direct ROI to a company’s bottom line.


Official Website: https://1flow.ai/

Interactive Demo: https://1flow.ai/demo

Documentation: https://1flow.ai/docs
one_liner: In-app user feedback software, powered by AI.
